participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and hopeful, Ethan is driven by his passion for music and dreams of achieving success as an artist.
participant_1.background: i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music.

participant_2.name: Nisha
participant_2.personality: Nisha is a curious and independent thinker, often finding herself torn between tradition and her desire for freedom.
participant_2.background: i am studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india.
